title: Ubel Blatt, Vol. 1 (Volume 1)
description: After twenty long years in the dark, the time has come for a confrontation with Glenn, one of the Seven Heroes!Hatred...envy...confusion...KÃ¶inzell's heart overflows with emotion as he moves singularly toward his revenge, blade in hand!
